title: Help me please!!
content:
I need to know what font is this please. Thank you very much for your help

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725065625im_/http:/typophile.com/files/aek-06-home-mw-ls-rivaldo_4462.jpg)

This is the image. Thank you!
author: Luzzy

comments.content:
Linotype has a nice feature article about football jersey typefaces:

[http://www.linotype.com/2710/footballjerseyfonts.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725065625/http:/www.linotype.com/2710/footballjerseyfonts.html "http://www.linotype.com/2710/footballjerseyfonts.html")

However, they display a Paraguay jersey that uses the exact same typeface and the closest match they can suggest is "Russell Square," which is similar, but only vaguely. I tried a "What the Font" search on myfonts.com and searched by letter characteristics on identifont.com, but came up empty.

The shirt you reference is from the 2007-2008 season for AEK Athens, and appears to have been created by Puma. The typeface may be custom to the company, and not commercially available.
